name: Environment | AC Voltage Returned to Normal Range
desciption: AC voltage returned to normal range

en.subject_template: The AC voltage measured at {{name}}, returned to the normal range.{%if threshold %} {{threshold}} threshold exceeded.{% endif %}{% if measure %} The current state is {{measure}}. {% endif %}{% if min %} Min state is {{min}}. {% endif %}{% if max %} Max state is {{max}}. {% endif %}
en.body_template: The AC voltage measured at {{name}}, returned to the normal range.{%if threshold %} {{threshold}} threshold exceeded.{% endif %}{% if measure %} The current state is {{measure}}. {% endif %}{% if min %} Min state is {{min}}. {% endif %}{% if max %} Max state is {{max}}. {% endif %}

disposition.name: dispose
